description:
8.60 asubboost
Boost subwoofer frequencies.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: asubboost

options.description: Set dry gain, how much of original signal is kept. Allowed range is from 0 to 1. Default value is 1.0.
options.name: dry

options.description: Set wet gain, how much of filtered signal is kept. Allowed range is from 0 to 1. Default value is 1.0.
options.name: wet

options.description: Set max boost factor. Allowed range is from 1 to 12. Default value is 2.
options.name: boost

options.description: Set delay line decay gain value. Allowed range is from 0 to 1. Default value is 0.0.
options.name: decay

options.description: Set delay line feedback gain value. Allowed range is from 0 to 1. Default value is 0.9.
options.name: feedback

options.description: Set cutoff frequency in Hertz. Allowed range is 50 to 900. Default value is 100.
options.name: cutoff

options.description: Set slope amount for cutoff frequency. Allowed range is 0.0001 to 1. Default value is 0.5.
options.name: slope

options.description: Set delay. Allowed range is from 1 to 100. Default value is 20.
options.name: delay

options.description: Set the channels to process. Default value is all available.
options.name: channels
